title: Historical Timelines and the Past

vocab.definition: A line that shows when things happened in order
The study of things that happened in the past

teachingNotes: Create personal timelines of students' lives from birth to present. Use pictures to show how things have changed over time. Compare past and present versions of common objects like phones, cars, and clothes.

sample.question: What shows events in the order they happened?
What is a 'future' event?
expectedAny: something that has not happened yet

sample.question: Name one thing that changed from the past to today.
Give an example of a personal timeline event.

truefalse.question: The past means things that are happening right now.
A timeline helps us see events in order.
Your birthday is part of your personal timeline.
We can compare the past and present to see change.
Pictures can be added to a timeline.
